title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 382/98 of 18 February 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 as regards the agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds for cherries provisionally preserved but unsuitable in that state for consumption
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 382/98 of 18 February 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 as regards the agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds for cherries provisionally preserved but unsuitable in that state for consumption
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87, in the sector '11. Products processed from fruit and vegetables`, for cherries provisionally preserved falling within product code 0812 10 00 9100, '50 %` shall be replaced by '45 %`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 24 February 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
